thread.section_title: Element New York Times Square West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Element New York Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Essexbird15
title: Great Location
text: I went here with my partner for 4 nights from 17th March. We booked this hotel for the location near Times Square and because it had a kitchen in the room. The bathroom was very modern and the shower was excellent. The room was clean and the kitchen even had a dishwasher. The room was a bit small with my partner having to negotiate his way past the air conditioning unit to get to bed. The free breakfast was great with a different hot meal everyday. On Monday to Thursday the hotel offered a snack and drink free of charge from 5.30 to 7pm . I would return to the hotel if I ever went back to New York.
